name: Reindrone
description:
The reindeers are on vacation, so you have to use the reindrone to deliver gifts and decorations.

The drone's battery is draining and it can only carry a limited amount of presents and decorations, so you have to return Home occasionally to refill and recharge.

The houses which need gift are indicated with orange,

the houses which need decoration are indicated with blue.

Gifts need to be dropped in the chimney,

Decorations need to be shot at the house.

Controls:

  • W - Forward
  • S - Back
  • A -  Left
  • D - Right
  • Space - Up
  • Ctrl - Down
  • Shift - Boost
  • LMB - Shoot Decoration
  • RMB - Drop Gift
  • Mouse - Turn, Look Around
  • F1 - Restart
  • M - Switch Metric/Imperial units
  • X - Change decor fire mode
  • Backspace - Toggle Hide HUD

(Be careful with the hotkeys or shortcuts if playing in browser)

I made it in 17 hours at christmas 2022.

I saw a bunch of horror themed christmas games on itchio, so I wanted to make something which is not a horror.

While I was making it, it reminded me of Rogue Squadron, that is the cause for the X key.

May contain bugs and unbalanced-ness;
